...Filmmaker website</p>\r\n Citation:       Ryan Trecartin <p>Ryan <mark>Trecartin's</mark> video narratives unfold like futuristic fever dreams. Collaborating...

...unique.&nbsp;</p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kevin McGarry writes, "Ryan <mark>Trecartin</mark> has established a singular video practice that in form...
...feels bewilderingly true to life."&nbsp;</p>\r\n\r\n<p>Ryan <mark>Trecartin</mark> was born in 1981 in Webster, Texas....
